Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Interface Divinity

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlockLevelUp, BlockSelectionWhenHigher, BlockWinOnPerimeter, BuildBeforeAndAfter, BuildDomeEverywhere, BuildTwice, BuildTwiceNotOnPerimeter, BuildTwiceNotSameTile, BuildTwiceSameTile, BuildUnderYourself, CannotSelectIfHigher, CannotWinOnPerimeter, Check5CompleteTowerWinCondition, DivinityDecoratorWithEffects, MoveAgainIfOnPerimeterSpace, MoveMultipleTimes, MoveOnOpponent, MoveTwiceNotBack, OpponentCannotMoveUp, PlayerWinWith5CompleteBuildings, PushOpponent, SetEffectOnOpponent, StandardDivinity, SwapWithOpponent, WinByDropTwoLevel
public interface Divinity
Interface implemented by all the divinities to realize the Decorator Pattern; as such it is passed as a parameter in the classes using a divinity

The choice of this Pattern is due to how we thought to implement the game: the Player can perform the base actions of Santorini calling the corresponding action on a StandardDivinity that calls the basic action on the Worker; each divinity is then "decorated" with other special moves and builds deriving from a specific divinity

    • move

      java.util.List<ModelUpdate> move​(Board board, Worker selectedWorker, Tile selectedTile)
      Moves the selectedWorker on the selectedTile of the Board
      Parameters:
      board - current Board
      selectedWorker - Selected worker from the Match
      selectedTile - Tile to move onto
      Returns:
      List of tiles modified during the move.

    • isWinner

      boolean isWinner​(Worker selectedWorker, Tile selectedTile)
      Checks if the worker is performing a winning action
      Parameters:
      selectedWorker - current worker performing an action
      selectedTile - Tile the worker is going to perform the action on
      Returns:
      true if the action will lead a player to win

      opponentPlayer - player affected by the divinity
